name: 劉明傑
objective:
The course covers the synthesis and analysis of both linear and nonlinear circuits. Contents include: 
1.	Circuit variable 
2.	Circular elements
3.	Sample Resistive circuits
4.	Techniques of Circuits Analysis
5.	The operation amplifier
6.	Inductance, Capacitance, and Mutual Inductance
7.	Response of RL and RC Circuits
8.	Natural and stable disbalance of RLC circuits
9.	Sinusoidal Steady- State Analysis
10.	Sinusoidal Steady power calculation
11.	Balanced Three -Phase Circuits
12.	Introduction to the Laplace transform
13.	The Laplace transform is circuit analysis
14.	Introduction to frequency selective circuits
15.	Active filter circuits
16.	Fourier series
17.	The Fourier Transform
18.	Two Port Circuits
schedule:
Chapter/ per week.
Explore new techniques.
scorePolicy:
Midterm exam
Homework three time
The final report shall be in English or Chinese, emphasizing programming language and circuit design.
materials:
Electric Circuits
Eleventh Edition
Nilsson Riedel
